root.completedmessage: Thank you for your feedback, this survey has been completed.

survey.label: Please rate your satisfaction of the following:

item.question: The written materials provided (contracts, documentation, etc.)
The status updates for the project
The consultant's ability to work with your employees

survey.label: Please tell us how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements:

item.question: This consultant delivers work on time
This consultant is consistent and reliable
This consultant met my budgetary expectations
This consultant listens to my concerns
I would hire this consultant again
I would recommend this consultant to others

comments.label:
If you have responded with "disagree" or "strongly disagree" for any question,
please tell us more about your experience:
Please provide general feedback about our performance as a service provider to your business
comments.answer: Prasanna is always very professional and consistently delivers strong results. We have developed a strong working relationship with him and look forward to working with him again.
